Overview
Overview / Product overview / Features / Document processing features / Usage scenarios for processing documents / Usage scenarios for AFP jobs
Usage scenarios for AFP jobs
These scenarios show the steps that a workflow might follow as it processes AFP jobs that contain documents.
In this section:
Sorting (one-to-one) job scenario
This scenario describes how you can sort a job so that its documents print in a certain order.
Splitting (one-to-many) job scenario
This scenario describes how you can divide a large job into smaller ones. One benefit of this approach is that it might reduce overall printing
time.
Parent topic: Usage scenarios for processing documents
1 of 1
